title: Warning when -Wshadow enabled
body:
**Describe the bug**
```
In file included from catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_automake.hpp:8,
                 from catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_automake.cpp:6:
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp: In constructor 'constexpr Catch::lineOfChars::lineOfChars(char)':
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp:246:38: error: declaration of 'c' shadows a member of 'Catch::lineOfChars' [-Werror=shadow]
  246 |         constexpr lineOfChars(char c):
      |                                      ^
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp:245:14: note: shadowed declaration is here
  245 |         char c;
      |              ^
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp: In constructor 'constexpr Catch::lineOfChars::lineOfChars(char)':
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp:248:10: error: declaration of 'c' shadows a member of 'Catch::lineOfChars' [-Werror=shadow]
  248 |         {}
      |          ^
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp:245:14: note: shadowed declaration is here
  245 |         char c;
      |              ^
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp: In constructor 'constexpr Catch::lineOfChars::lineOfChars(char)':
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp:248:10: error: declaration of 'c' shadows a member of 'Catch::lineOfChars' [-Werror=shadow]
  248 |         {}
      |          ^
catch/src/catch2/reporters/catch_reporter_bases.hpp:245:14: note: shadowed declaration is here
  245 |         char c;
```

**Expected behavior**
Should not throw warnings and catch should compile with the strictest warnings enabled.

**Reproduction steps**
Add `-Wshadow`


**Platform information:**
<!-- Fill in any extra information that might be important for your issue. -->
 - OS: Mac OS
 - Compiler+version: GCC 10.X.X
 - Catch version: v3.0.0 preview 2
